title: Zero copy
body: As close to a zero-copy implementation as feasible

title: Fix memberkey parsing with type choice idents in std prelude
Better support for nested inline groups and group entries
body:
This PR provides better support for nested inline groups and group entries. For example:

```
concise-swid-tag = {
  ? (( payload => payload-entry ) // ( evidence => evidence-entry )),
}
```

The group entry in the map above should be parsed as an optional group choice between two inline groups. Prior to this PR, this example wasn't being parsed correctly.

Furthermore, these fixes also include a rudimentary `Iterator` implementation of `Lexer`, which lays the groundwork for refactoring the validation code.

title: Fix type1 member key parsing issues
body: Group entries whose member keys are of table tables (`Type1` from ABNF grammar) were not being properly parsed. This addresses #37.

title: Remove unneeded regex features
body: Remove unneeded regex features to address #17.

title: CBOR validation fixes
body:
A collection of CBOR validation fixes.

The map fix has an open question (see the comment with "REVIEW NEEDED"); I don't really understand the control flow so I'm not sure whether the fix needs to be implemented in more than one place.

Homogeneous arrays (e.g. `[ * int]`) still don't validate (though they didn't before my record-array change, so I don't think I made anything worse than it was before).  I'll keep looking at it.

title: Cbor tests
body:
There are a number of array validation failures that I'd like to work on but since I have a collection of tests that I *think* are correct I thought I'd send out for review.

There are a number of things that are disabled; all should have "FIXME" comments attached.  Feel free to point out any that seem incorrect.

title: WASM and linting cleanup
body: Better WASM error handling and clippy fixes.

title: Fix registry URL in .npmrc and publish dir
body: Fix registry URL in .npmrc and publish dir

title: Integration testing and improved offset tracking
body: Integration tests with AST verifications. Improved offset tracking for error handling.

title: Fix group choice, group entry, occurrence operator and tag parsing issues
String refactor for enabling better support for IDEs
body: Removes `&str`'s in favor of `String`'s for enabling better support for IDEs.
